name: @tps/kits-planning-suite
description: Aragon Planning Suite developed by Autark

scripts.docker:run: cd ../../node_modules/@aragon/kits-beta-base/; docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d; RESULT=$?; cd -; $(exit $RESULT)
scripts.test:prepare: truffle compile && yarn docker:run && yarn docker:wait-gas && yarn deploy:devnet
scripts.test:rpc: yarn test:prepare:rpc && truffle test --network rpc test/planning-suite.test.js
scripts.test:docker: yarn test:prepare && yarn test:devnet && yarn docker:stop
scripts.publish:rpc: aragon apm publish major $(yarn deploy:kit:rpc | tail -n 1) --environment default
scripts.deploy:kit:rpc: aragon contracts compile --all && aragon contracts exec --network rpc scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js
scripts.publish:staging: aragon apm publish major $(yarn deploy:kit:staging | tail -n 1) --environment staging
scripts.deploy:kit:staging: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0xfe03625ea880a8cba336f9b5ad6e15b0a3b5a939 aragon contracts exec --network rinkeby scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js
scripts.publish:rinkeby: aragon apm publish major $(yarn deploy:kit:rinkeby | tail -n 1) --environment rinkeby
scripts.deploy:kit:rinkeby: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x98Df287B6C145399Aaa709692c8D308357bC085D aragon contracts exec --network rinkeby scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js
scripts.publish:mainnet: aragon apm publish major $(yarn deploy:kit:mainnet | tail -n 1) --environment mainnet
scripts.deploy:kit:mainnet: aragon contracts compile --all && ENS=0x314159265dd8dbb310642f98f50c066173c1259b aragon contracts exec --network mainnet scripts/planning-suite-deploy.js

author: Autark LLC <autark.xyz>
